pageTitle: Safe{Core} — Modular Ethereum Smart Account Infrastructure | Safe
description: Embrace limitless possibilities with Safe{Core}'s modular Smart Account infrastructure, tailored for all account abstraction use cases, including ERC-4337.

title: Build the Most Secure Onchain Apps
text: Leverage the most battle-tested smart account stack, securing over $100 billion in assets.

title: Add Multi-Factor Security to Your Apps
text: Safe{core} lets you integrate robust on-chain multi-factor authentication.Give your users the peace of mind they deserve with secure, customizable logins.

title: Empower Your Users with Secure Account Recovery
text: Don't let lost keys jeopardize user experience and trust. Safe {Core} provides seamless onchain recovery solutions that enhance security without compromising control.

title: Build for the Future, Escape Lock-In
text: Gone are the day of building for a specific standard only to have the landscape shift beneath you. Build your apps with the Safe{Core} future-proof approach standard.

title: Get started with Safe <u>CORE</u> Account Abstraction SDK

items.title: Smart Contracts
items.text:
• Multi-signature standard to enforce security and flexibility
  • Modular and customizable smart accounts
  • Manage owners, transaction thresholds, delegate calls and much more

items.title: SDK
items.text:
• Safe Starter Kit: Unified interface for all Safe Smart Account functionalities.
  • Protocol Kit: Create, configure, and manage Safe Smart Accounts.
  • API Kit: Interact with Safe Transaction Service API and account data.
  • Relay Kit: Enables ERC-4337 for flexible transaction fee payments.

items.title: Infrastructure
items.text:
• Safe Transaction Service: An API to track and manage Safe Smart Account transactions
  • Safe Event Service: Indexes Safe events and delivers them via webhooks.

caption: Safe ecosystem builders
title: See what web3’s best builders have to say
Build with Safe. We’ve got your back.
